1) The assassination of the Daimyo Yabu causes Kage-sama to retaliate
2) Kage-sama orders his ally, General Okkoto, to start a bloody rebellion.
3) For fear of his son, the Shogun orders Mugen to bring Ryūnosuke to safety
4) After Mugen's return, the team must help twith fighting the rebels.
5) They are put under the command of the Shogun's brother (Noboru) 
5) No one knows that Noboru himself is Kage-sama.
6) We also meet Noboru's son, a man called Masaru, who will be important later.

column10: Lord Yabu's death was a small victory. The Shogun took possession of the old temple. Kage-sama had lost an ally, but his revenge followed soon.
column12: 除掉薮大名可算旗开得胜，将军也随即控制了生产武器的古庙。影大人损失了一位盟友，但他很快便展开复仇。

column10: Having already gained more than enough weapons, he was well prepared to openly attack the Shogun.
column12: 他已获得充足的武器装备，准备公然攻击将军。

column10: On Kage-sama's orders, the ruthless General Okkoto spread fear throughout the country, raiding village after village without mercy.
column12: 影大人派出手下乙事大将，一个接一个地无情洗劫各地村庄，散播恐怖。

column10: As they continued, Okkoto and his men grew bolder with every attack. The Shogun, fearing an assault on Edo Castle, orders Mugen to deliver his son Ryūnosuke to a secret location …
column12: 随着暴行继续，乙事及其手下越发肆无忌惮。将军担心儿子在江户城遭到暗杀，便命令无限将龙之介护送到一个秘密地点……

column10: Because of the rebellion, the Shogun orders Mugen to bring his son to safety. They both leave for an unknown location, later revealed to be Mount Tsuru.
column12: Because of the rebellion, the Shogun orders Mugen to bring his son to safety. They both leave for an unknown location, later revealed to be Mount Tsuru.

column10: Edo Castle, 3 months later
column12: 江户城，三个月后

column10: Your handling of the traitor Yabu was careless. It only made our enemy lash out with greater force.
column12: 之前对叛徒薮大名的处理也太大意了。才导致敌人的反叛行动不降反增。

column10: We thought him to be Kage-sama himself. It was my mistake, and I take full responsibility.
column12: 我们本以为他就是影大人。是在下失职，在下愿负全部责任。

column10: My brother is currently fighting the rebels with the Shogunate army. I put you and your men under his command.
column12: 舍弟正率领幕府军和叛军交战。我想把你们几个交给他指挥。

column10: As you wish. Serving your brother is serving the Shogunate.
column12: 遵命。效忠您的弟弟也就是效忠幕府。

column10: Help him destroy this rebellion, and we might yet contain the damage Kage-sama has done.
column12: 协助他消灭叛军，同时也许能让影大人的暴行有所收敛。

column10: How long do you think it'll take to defeat the rebels Mugen-sensei?
column12: 无限老师，你觉得消灭叛军需要多久？

column10: I do not know, my lord.
column12: 恕在下不知，大人。

column10: Indeed. And should the city fall under attack, I will feel safe knowing you are far away from harm.
column12: 的确。不过只要你能远离这里，即便敌人兵临城下，我也能安心。

column10: Father.
column12: 父亲。

column10: Go prepare for the journey. Mugen will join you shortly.
column12: 去收拾一下准备出发吧。无限很快会和你会合的。

column9: bows to Shogun and Mugen and leaves the scene
column10: Yes father. Sensei.
column12: 遵命，父亲...老师，我先行告退。

column10: My only son, Mugen. Will you deliver him safely?
column12: 我只有这一个儿子，无限。能否将其安全送到？

column10: I will protect him with my life.
column12: 在下以性命担保。

column10: I would die a thousand deaths before I let any harm come to him.
column12: 在下就算粉身碎骨也要保少主毫发无伤。

column10: I know you will. Now leave, and join my brother in his war camp once you are done.
column12: 我相信你。去吧，完成任务之后就去舍弟的营地报到。

column10: As would be your duty. Now leave, and join my brother in his warcamp once you are done.
column12: 你一向尽职尽责。去吧，完成任务之后就去舍弟的营地报到。

column10: My Shogun.
column12: 容我告退，将军大人。

column10: War Camp of the Shogunate Army
column12: 幕府军营地

column10: Lord Noboru, you wished to speak to us.
column12: 昇大人，您召见我们。

column9: indicates two points on the map
column10: Mugen-san. Our scouts have returned. They report rebel activity in the villages of Hida, and Suganuma.
column12: 无限阁下，侦察兵带回消息说，飞騨村和菅沼村有叛军活动。

column10: Would you like us to investigate?
column12: 您要派我们前去调查吗？

column10: I would. We must use every opportunity to learn Okkoto's plans.
column12: 是的。必须利用一切机会查清乙事的计划。

column10: Espionage then. We enter the villages with the cover of night, see what we can learn.
column12: 那就是侦查任务咯。可以借着夜色掩护潜入村子，打探消息。

column10: Mugen-san. They say you were born a farmer so you must know how to handle  peasants.
column12: 无限老师，听说你是农民出身，那你肯定熟悉怎么和农民打交道咯。

column10: My son will show more respect!
column12: 孽子，不得无礼！

column10: … I apologize, Mugen-sama.
column12: ……我道歉，无限大人。

column10: Hrm … you are forgiven.
column12: 不必……我并不在意。

column10: Mugen-san. I want you and Takuma-san at Suganuma village.
column12: 无限阁下，我想派你和琢磨老先生前往菅沼村。

column10: May I accompany them, Lord Noboru?
column12: 我能一同前往吗，昇大人？

column10: No, your skills are more suited to Hida, where the rebel presence is stronger. You and your two companions will go there at once.
column12: 不行，你的身手更适合去飞騨村，那儿的叛军人多势众。你和另外两位同伴即刻出发吧。

column10: … as you wish, Noboru-sama. I shall lead the second group.
column12: ……遵命, 昇大人。我将指挥这个小队。

column10: Hrm, who made you the leader?
column12: 嗯？谁同意你指挥了？

column10: Why can't we all go to one place together?
column12: 为什么我们五个不能一起行动呢?

column10: Hush, Yuki-chan.
column12: 别说话，友希小妹。

column10: My father has made a decision, little girl. Who are you to question it?
column12: 这可是家父的命令，小姑娘。你是谁啊，胆敢质疑？

column10: I … I …
And who are you, boy, to frighten children when there is war on our doorstep?
column12: 小子，你又是谁啊，兵临城下了还在这儿吓唬小孩子？

column10: How dare you speak to me old man!
column12: 你说什么，老瘸子！

column10: Enough!  Okkoto is spreading chaos and disorder in the name of Kage-sama. We must find him quickly and see that justice is done.
column12: 够了！乙事正以影大人之名制造恐慌。务必尽快找到他，伸张正义。

column10: Yes, Lord Noboru. We will return triumphant.
column12: 遵命，昇大人。等待我们胜利归来吧。
